Description.Text: Welcome to the Northumberland Hotel in Edinburgh, a traditional, child-friendly, individually styled hotel, which is an ideal base for golf breaks, shopping and tourist attractions. Different from most hotels in Edinburgh, the Northumberland Hotel also has a free, secure guest car park. The hotel has an experienced and dedicated team who, through their personal service, aim to ensure that guests have a comfortable and relaxing stay. All bedrooms are en-suite and a number of our rooms have access to a sunny rooftop terrace, where it is perfect to unwind with a bottle of wine which the reception would be happy to deliver to the room. Bedroom features include, direct dial telephone, hairdryer, tea/coffee making facilities, color television, iron & ironing board available on request, free wireless broadband internet, cots available on request The hotel offers Bar, Non-smoking rooms, Parking facilities, Reception.
The hotel is situated just 2 miles from Edinburgh city center and ideally located for business travelers, golf breaks, families and sightseeing. The city centre is just 5 minutes away by bus or taxi.

Single En-Suite Room - Single room with one single bed and en-suite bathroom. Facilities include telephone, Digital TV, hair dryer, tea / coffee, radio alarm. FREE WIFI, Non-smoking rooms.
Double En- Suite Room - Double room with en-suite bathroom. Comprising of Double bed, Room facilities included telephone, Digital TV, hair dryer, tea / coffee, radio alarm. FREE WIFI,Non-smoking rooms.
Twin En-Suite Room - Twin room with en-suite bathroom. Comprising of two single beds, Room facilities include telephone, Digital TV, hair dryer, tea / coffee, radio alarm. FREE WIFI
Family En-Suite Room - Family room with en-suite bathroom. Comprising of one double and one single bed, Room facilities include telephone, Digital TV, hair dryer, tea / coffee, radio alarm. FREE WIFI
